Key Match Events: The Oklahoma City Thunder extended their win streak to a franchise-record 13 in a row
The Thunder outscored the Los Angeles Clippers 42-20 in the third quarter to completely flip the scoreboard
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Paycom Center
Others: Jalen Williams had a buzzer-beating floater at the end of the first half
Amir Coffey led the way for the Clippers with 26 points
